scripts.build: export $(cat tools/env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat compile
scripts.test: export $(cat tools/env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && HARDHAT_DEPLOY_FIXTURE=true hardhat test
scripts.coverage: export $(cat tools/env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && HARDHAT_DEPLOY_FIXTURE=true hardhat coverage
scripts.fork:test: export $(cat tools/env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && HARDHAT_DEPLOY_FIXTURE=true HARDHAT_FORK=true npx hardhat test
scripts.fork:execute: export $(cat tools/env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && HARDHAT_FORK=true npx hardhat run
scripts.fork:testnet: export $(cat tools/env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && HARDHAT_FORK=true npx hardhat node
scripts.node:hardhat: export $(cat tools/env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat node --no-deploy
scripts.node:hardhat:deploy: export $(tools/cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat node --network hardhat --export ./deployments/localhost.json
scripts.deploy:hardhat: export $(cat tools/env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat deploy --network localhost --export ./deployments/localhost.json
scripts.run:hardhat: export $(cat tools/env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat run --network localhost
scripts.deploy:testnet: export $(cat tools/env/.testnet.env | xargs) && npx hardhat deploy --network testnet --export ./deployments/testnet.json
scripts.run:testnet: export $(cat tools/env/.testnet.env | xargs) && npx hardhat run --network testnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet: export $(cat tools/env/.mainnet.env | xargs) && npx hardhat deploy --network mainnet --export ./deployments/mainnet.json
scripts.run:mainnet: export $(cat tools/env/.mainnet.env | xargs) && npx hardhat run --network mainnet
scripts.prepare:build: export $(cat tools/env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat compile
